comments: Streaming to tv has improved a lot, but you still cannot decide what level of HD you want to stream based on the bandwidth you have. You can do it for downloads, sort of (low/med/high), but this doesn't really tell you anything except for how many hours you can store. This is useless for phone users who may want to tailor the quality to their phone's resolution. Also, I think the older Simpsons episodes are still oddly cropped to fit 16:9, which cuts off some of the image.

Lots of content, but the app is trash. The app is not at all feature-rich, and it is often glitchy. Most shows are 2min long, and it stops playback after every show. This drives my kids nuts, which in turn drives me nuts. I dont want to have to find and play a new episode every 2 min or less. Netflix has set the bar on what to expect from a streaming app, and disney cannot compete. Casting to another device, is never a smooth experience.

Update March 22: after downloading an update for the app, now I can't watch anything. The audio come through but the screen just stay black. For all the shows and movies. Please fix. If you haven't update, don't do it!! __________________ Does not work in note 10 I have a note 10 plus and I get the error 83. Still waiting for the fix. Thanks.

Got the app when it originally came out a few months back to watch the mandalorian... But the moment the season stopped I tapped out because the app does not work. It freezes. Audio de-syncs. Not worth the money when other streaming services can provide subtitles, and fluid streaming. And if you look up the problem it just falls back onto your internet speeds... which I do not have a problem with. I regularly sit at 24mbps. Disappointed and will be uninstalling again.

Very, very frustrating. Since update about 2 weeks back, app allows log in and access to title select screen, then simply doesn't work. Wouldnt even run previously downloaded content. After an endless series of 83 errors, I reinstalled. Now, I get to the play screen, and get a never ending load screen. PERMIT USE TO STREAM IN BROWSER, INSTEAD OF YOUR APP THAT DOES NOT WORK.

title: Disney Movie Insiders
description:
Earn points, discover insider perks, redeem rewards and unlock special interactive experiences with Disney Movie Insiders. Become an Insider today - it's free to join. 

MAKE IT A MOVIE NIGHT
Check Disney, Pixar, Marvel Studios and Star Wars movie showtimes, see what’s coming soon and buy tickets. Prefer a cozy night in? Explore what’s on Blu-rayTM, DVD and digital.

GET ALL THE PERKS
Earn points for eligible purchases and redeem for rewards such as discounts on movie tickets, invitations to members-only events, special offers and more.

comments: Been a disney rewards since it started, but I dislike this rewards program now. You can't get disney movies...just junk. Or gift cards. you really can't use them for anything... You really need to go back to old rewards. Thank you, please listen to your Customers which seem like a lot of us. Or let us choose which program we would like. Again thank you.

Waste of time. Disney Movie Rewards used to have great rewards like DVDs, Blu-rays and movie posters. This new "Insiders" program only has useless e-gift cards and digital nothings. They keep saying "more physical rewards will be added in the future" but notice how they never explicitly mention movies. This program is dead, there is no reason to collect points now.

Less rewards than before, no way to sort or search based off of categories or point amount, and 99% of the "rewards" are just coupons for 25% off. This needs a total overhaul, and brought back to how it was when it was Disney Movie Rewards! It's pointless now.

All the points I have collected, and now I can't use them!! All the rewards are completely useless to me. What a great way to slap your costumers in the face with such usless stuff! Coupons, what a joke! So does that mean I am going to lose all my points because I can't use them now? And don't give me that generic "we're adding more rewards" message you give to everyone! I want to be able to get DVDs, not coupons. It's not rocket science, that's why people collect points.

This app is more difficult to navigate than the website disney movie rewards. On the web site i could use my points for purchading a number of things including some movies. I miss being able to do this you should reconfigure to make it more user friendly. And bring back some of the other features the website had. It was more user friendly so everyone can use it.

title: Movie Collection
description:
Manage and keep track of your personal DVD, Blu-Ray movie collection.

This free version is limited up to 40 entries and should just demonstrate the features.
You can remove the limitation with a purchase of the addon 'Movie Collection Unlocker'.

• All movie/TV show details like description, actors, covers in one place.
• Direct links to IMDb, Rotten tomatoes, Metascore or YouTube.
• Keep track of borrowed movies.
• Add new entries by title, keyword or via barcode scanner.
• Add as many lists as you want.
• Move or copy entries between lists.
• Many sorting and filter capabilities.
• A lot of styling capabilities.
• Mark movies as seen.
• Download posters etc.

Please note: "This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb."
descriptionHTML:
Manage and keep track of your personal DVD, Blu-Ray movie collection.

This free version is limited up to 40 entries and should just demonstrate the features.
You can remove the limitation with a purchase of the addon 'Movie Collection Unlocker'.

• All movie/TV show details like description, actors, covers in one place.
• Direct links to IMDb, Rotten tomatoes, Metascore or YouTube.
• Keep track of borrowed movies.
• Add new entries by title, keyword or via barcode scanner.
• Add as many lists as you want.
• Move or copy entries between lists.
• Many sorting and filter capabilities.
• A lot of styling capabilities.
• Mark movies as seen.
• Download posters etc.

Please note: "This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb."
summary:
Manage your personal movie collection.
APP IS NOT DESIGNED TO WATCH MOVIES

Horner Landstr. 193
22111 Hamburg
Germany

comments: So far I really like the app, but the only thing that's holding it back from being the best that I've tried, is trying to scan VHS barcodes doesn't come up with anything even though it has a feature for it. Also when scanning in complete series of shows, it defaults to Blu-ray and you have to go in and singly select each season to which format that is. But the best thing about this app though, is it shows what format of the movie that you own in multiple formats.

Really awesome!!! It's so easy to use this app and add all the movies scanning the barcodes. You can see all the information you need about every movie in a sight. Even you can watch the trailer in most of them. The only thing is that I would like to be able to sort the movies by kind of audience of every movie. I mean, "G" General Audience, "PG" Parent Guidance, you name it. Really good app anyway.

I was using an excel spreadsheet for my collection before finding this. I collect VHS tapes. This has all the movies and all the formats. Lots of sorting and filter options. Keep in mind that over 40 movies, you have to buy the paid version (only $2). Great app that helps with organizing my collection. Highly recommend to collectors.

Superb, all my movies on one app, plus backup, the downside about the backup is that it cannot be backed up to Google drive, to get it to be the same on my tablet I have to download it to a stick and then transfer it to the tablet, so much faffing about. If it could be downloaded to Google drive then I would definitely give it 5 stars.

I've been searching for about a year now for the best movie inventory app, and this is definitely it. After you get used to how things work, you'll find this app works great and allows for some neat visual customisation options and smart optimisations for organising your collection. I'll likely buy the unlocker soon, as my movie collection is quickly reaching the 40 film limit set by this free version. Don't let that number scare you off though, this app is well worth downloading.

comments: *edit to add* read the responses to other complaints. It is a cookie cutter response that doesn't have anything to do with the issues. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THIS APP!! My card just got charged and I can't even get into the app to watch anything. It keeps telling me network difficulties. I don't even know how I can get a refund and cancel my subscription. I am not going to pay for something I can't watch. Charged me after I asked them to cancel.

Very poor service. I am having continuous problems. It keeps telling me I have too many devices logged in and I am only using it on 1 tv. It makes no sense. I have edited this review on 3/20/20. They did not help me at all by email. I emailed them at the time I started having problems and I replied with the information they requested. The only way I got the problem solved was by actually calling the help line. You will be on hold for awhile but since I called I have not had anymore problems!

This app is great when it works. I'm paying for a subscription and I can't even watch anything. Everytime I log in and then go to play a movie it logs me out and takes me back to the login screen. I've tried force stop and restart, uninstall and restart and it still does it. Please help. I'm very frustrated.

The movies and shows are the expected fare, though there are a couple of titles that are older Pixl shows I'm surprised not to find here. My biggest issue is that the app randomly kicks me off without warning and asks me to sign in all over again. A secondary issue is that app itself is a little clunky.

This app stops working constantly! I'll come back in to finish a movie and it will be "unavailable at this time". 3/11 still not working properly, crashes a lot. I even try uninstalling the app and reinstalling it and then it tells me I have too many devices. I haven't added devices, I'm just trying to get the app to work. This is especially disappointing when you pay $70+ a year for an app to work and it doesn't.

comments: Ads placed literally five seconds apart during the "tutorials", which consists of six different parts, about five minutes each. Made it to the second part, and the app insists on a viewer rating of five stars ( no choice ) before proceeding. Never watched a movie, as this seems fraudulent.

Horrible app DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!! I downloaded this thinking it would be a lot better then it is. All this app does is advertise for Hulu and Showtime apps. When you finally get to the "movies" all it is is a bunch of YouTube videos you can go and look at anytime by yourself with the YouTube channel. It is a complete waste of space, time and energy. Stay as far away from this app as possible!!!!

Can't even get in the app because it just crashes and takes me out the second I try to get back in. Also, I just downloaded to see what a fake app this is because I'm assuming that you can't watch over 1000 movies for FREE. Awesome! Thank you so much for these services provided. So much less of a problem in comparison to some apps that don't respond as in perform in a sufficient and not so complicated manner. If you'd like to watch a movie, this app is for you, as it is for me.
